children.text: In the course of determining standings, the scorekeeper might need to distinguish between two players with equal match records.
In these cases, the following tiebreakers should be applied in order:
The player with higher game win%
The player with higher opponents’ mean (average) match win%
The player with higher opponents’ mean (average) game win%
If after all tiebreakers are applied, two players are still of equal standing in the competition, the scorekeeper should use a random method to break the tie.
